alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Putnam (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 10:46PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Putnam and southeastern Bureau Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1045 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bradford to Bay View Gardens. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Tiskilwa around 1055 PM CDT. DePue and Bureau Junction around 1105 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hennepin, Granville, Spring Valley, Ladd and Dalzell. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 65 and 72. Interstate 180 between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
